roleset.name: put paint on a surface
roleset.note: PAINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'paint' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet.In the absence of arg2's it will be very difficult to distinguishsenses. Bummer. (from paint.01-v predicate notes)
PAINTING-N NOTES: Based on verb entry paint.01; corresponds to VN class 25.1. (from painting.01-n)

example.name: explicit mention of paint
example.text: They painted the apartment orange, pink and white, according to her instructions.

example.name: different mention
example.text: ``[Lighthouse II]-1'' was painted *trace*-1 in oils by the playwright in 1901...

example.name: All arguments
example.text: John's painting of the house with bright purple lacquer disturbed the neighbors.

roleset.name: create pictures with paint
roleset.note: PAINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'paint' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet.In the absence of arg2's it will be very difficult to distinguishsenses. Bummer. (from paint.02-v predicate notes)
PAINTING-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry paint.02. Corresponds to VN classes 25.2 and 26.7-2 (from painting.02-n)

example.name: intransitive verse
example.text: With lipsticks, liners, lotions and creams,/ There are still beauty plans left to tackle:/ But as the years go by, it seems/ That before I paint, I should spackle.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The allegations, ranging from theft and bribery to coercion and lewdness, paint a disquieting picture.
example.arg: ranging from theft and bribery to coercion and lewdness

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: John painted a picture of a rose for Mary.

example.name: Arg 0 only, within LVC
example.text: From paintings of his done during that early period , one sees how Hsia rendered human figures using the thick lines of traditional Chinese folk painting , but proceeded to dissect and reassemble those figures in a Western , mechanistic fashion .

example.name: transitive
example.text: He doesn't mention the painting of the altarpiece for the Chapel of St Bernard.
example.arg: for the Chapel of St Bernard

roleset.name: depict, describe
roleset.note: PAINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'paint' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet.In the absence of arg2's it will be very difficult to distinguishsenses. Bummer. (from paint.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: And the failures make it possible for Warner in its current lawsuit to paint the producers as ingrates.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mackenzie's revelations about her father have overshadowed her painting of Jagger as a sleazy sexual opportunist.
